bibl.title: Communal Agriculture in the Ptolemaic and Roman Fayyum.
Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007
bibl.author: MONSON, Andrew

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Hypothesis: there is a link between population density and the level of privatization. - Population density. - The proportion of public and private land. - Qualitative differences in land tenure. - Conclusion.
MONSON Andrew, Communal Agriculture in the Ptolemaic and Roman Fayyum.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 173-186, 3 figg.
